titles.title: To waive the 35-mile requirement for designation of a critical access hospital under the Medicare program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/13/2009--Introduced. Waives the 35-mile requirement for designation of a critical access hospital (CAH) under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act for a hospital located in Osceola, Missouri.
